title: Broken Glass
description: Lies. Betrayal. Two hearts broken. One on the path of revenge. The other finding their way.HOPEMake it out alive.That was my only goal.I succeeded.But that doesn’t mean I’m ready to face the world.Until Leo…He’s shown me there is hope.I can find happiness again.There is a way.LEOThey thought they broke me.All they did was create a monster.One who now has all the power.Revenge is sweet, but it’s even better when it’s sought justly.When all is said and done, they will answer for what they did to me, and to Hope.Can two broken and battered hearts find refuge in each other, or are some wounds too deep to heal?
author: Pavan Kaur
